meanings.sent1: The used book was resalable, so the store put it back on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The resalable toy was in great condition, making it easy to sell.
meanings.sent3: The resalable shirt found a new owner who appreciated its quality.
meanings.sent4: Her resalable skills in finding bargains made her popular among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The resalable car attracted many buyers due to its excellent condition.

meanings.sent1: After cleaning and repairing, the resalable furniture looked brand new.
meanings.sent2: The resalable electronics were priced competitively for a quick sale.
meanings.sent3: The resalable shoes were so comfortable that they sold in no time.
meanings.sent4: His resalable ideas for marketing products always brought success.
meanings.sent5: The resalable house had all the features buyers were looking for.
